fields.name: Description
fields.value: Generate a combined behavior and resource manifest pack with extra options

fields.name: Parameters (behavior)
fields.value:
`bp_name` - The name of the behavior pack
`bp_description` - The description of the behavior pack
`bp_version` - Minimum engine version of the behavior pack
`bp_use_metadata` - Also add a metadata field for the behavior pack
`bp_authors` - Author names of the behavior pack separated by commas. Only included if bp_use_metadata is enabled
`bp_author_url` - Author website of the behavior pack. Only included if bp_use_metadata is enabled
`bp_use_gametest` - Also enable the GameTest module.
`bp_gametest_entry_file` - Path to the GameTest entry file. Only included if bp_use_gametest is enabled
`bp_use_scripts` - Also enable client script
